# Docs - Cloud Functions reliability guide
Last reviewed 2023-07-19 UTC
Cloud Functions is a scalable, event-driven, serverless platform to help build and connect services. Cloud Functions can be called via HTTP request or triggered based on background events.
content:
## Best practices
- [Cloud Functions best practices](/functions/docs/bestpractices/tips) - guidelines on how to use and interact with Cloud Functions, implement [idempotency](/architecture/framework/reliability/design-scale-high-availability#design_api_calls_and_operational_commands_to_be_retryable) , deploy functions, and optimize performance.
